hero.title: Our Clients
hero.intro: We believe that the key to the company's success is putting the client's needs first.
hero.paragraph1: In partnership with our subcontractors and suppliers, we offer solutions that fully meet the clients' desires. We work with materials and equipment of proven quality from leading Bulgarian and international manufacturers.
hero.paragraph2: In the implementation of projects, we apply all modern technologies and materials established in European construction practice and strive to meet the highest client requirements in terms of quality and price.
hero.paragraph3: We value our clients and build partnerships with them, striving to find a flexible and individual solution for each of them, professionally and responsibly executing our projects with quality and on time.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. is a construction company with 100% private capital, founded at the end of 2007.
about.description: The company specializes in construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation and improvement of existing buildings, as well as the development of transport, energy and landscaping infrastructure. The company's activities also include hydraulic construction, environmental projects, warranty and post-warranty maintenance of facilities.
about.registry: Since 2008, the company has been registered in the Central Professional Register of Builders at the Chamber of Builders in Bulgaria and is authorized to execute construction projects in all five construction groups in accordance with national legislation.

services.title: Activities
services.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. performs a full range of construction activities in the following areas:
items: Transport Infrastructure - construction, rehabilitation and repair of roads, streets, bridges and road facilities
Water Supply and Sewerage Projects - construction and rehabilitation of water supply and sewerage networks and facilities
Residential and Building Construction - construction, reconstruction and repair of residential and industrial buildings
Energy Efficiency - renovation of residential and public buildings
Landscaping and Greenery - construction and renovation of parks, gardens, playgrounds and urban areas
Public Use Buildings and Facilities - construction and repair of educational, sports, cultural and other public facilities
HVAC Systems - design and construction of heating, ventilation and air conditioning installations
Waste Treatment Facilities and Installations - construction of landfills, installations and treatment plants for wastewater and waste
services.footer: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. possesses a wide range of specialized construction machinery and construction assets necessary for the operation of any construction company.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Part of our portfolio of completed projects

map.title: Our Clients
map.description: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" has completed construction projects in over 18 regions across the country, in partnership with state institutions, municipalities and private investors.

hero.title: Our Projects
hero.intro: Explore our portfolio of completed projects. Each project is proof of our commitment to quality and innovation.
hero.description: Since its establishment, "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. has participated in various public procurement projects in the field of construction, financed by international institutions, state and private investors. The company has experience in executing special public procurement contracts regulated according to the Classified Information Protection Act.

machinery.title: Machinery
machinery.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. possesses a wide range of specialized construction machinery that meets modern standards for safety and efficiency.
machinery.description: Our machinery includes modern heavy and specialized equipment from leading manufacturers. Each machine is maintained in excellent technical condition and operated by experienced operators to ensure maximum efficiency and safety on the construction site.

hero.intro: Since 2008, Techno Stroy Bulgaria Ltd. has been operating in accordance with international standards for quality, environment, and safety.
hero.description: The company's policy is focused on improving the quality management system to increase customer satisfaction by fully meeting their requirements.

practices.title: Quality Management Methods
items: Implementation of new modern technologies for construction work
Application of practices for effective human resources management
Timely and quality execution of contracted construction works
Successful implementation of internal quality control
Adoption and application of new modern technologies and materials
practices.footer: The company's policy is focused on commitment to sustainable economic development, fair labor relations with workers, protection from discrimination, compliance with regulatory requirements for healthy and safe working conditions, and environmental protection.
